title: Deals | Old Navy
text: *First Purchase Discount: Subject to credit approval. Your new credit card must be used as sole payment type. Code expires at 11:59pm PT fourteen (14) days from date of Account open. Open a new Navyist Rewards Credit Card or Navyist Rewards Visa Credit Card to receive a 20% discount on your first purchase. If new Account is opened in Old Navy stores, discount will be applied to first purchase in store made same day. If new Account is opened at oldnavy.gap.com discount code expires at 11:59pm PT 14 days from date of Account open. Not valid at other brands. Valid in the U.S. (including Puerto Rico) only. Only one account opening discount per Account. The First Purchase discount and Family of Brands discounts cannot be combined. Discounts cannot be combined with FitPro, Brand Ambassador, student or employee discounts, but can be combined with one other offer in a single transaction. Excludes gift cards, shipping, taxes, third-party and co-branded merchandise at Banana Republic and Yeezy Gap. No adjustments to previous purchases. Not valid in our Clearance Center. Offer subject to change. Loading, please wait
